scripts.docker-web-migrate: docker-compose exec web php artisan migrate
scripts.docker-web-clear-config: docker-compose exec web php artisan config:clear
scripts.docker-web-cache-config: docker-compose exec web php artisan config:cache
scripts.docker-web-start-que: docker-compose exec web php artisan queue:work
scripts.docker-web-restart-que: docker-compose exec web php artisan queue:restart
scripts.docker-web-send-test-email: docker-compose exec web php artisan user:send-test-welcome-email
scripts.docker-web-send-sentry-test: docker-compose exec web php artisan sentry:test
